title: Pizzeria Rialto
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Western, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has an international cuisine menu including Indian, Italian, Mexican. Offers a large variety of vegetarian and vegan dishes (some vegetarian can be made vegan). Small authentic cozy restaurant with English and German speaking owners; knows what vegan means and happy to help. Serves vegan Indian dishes such as samosas, pakora, vegetable curry, curry with kidney beans or lentils (dal), alu gobi, rice as a side dish. Also offers Mexican and Italian vegan dishes.
